name: DNV GL 5th Annual Healthcare Symposium
content: Each year DNV GL hosts a Healthcare Symposium, providing attendees with information on current and emerging healthcare issues, the latest thinking, innovative solutions to new and recurring issues and the opportunity to network with other healthcare executives from around the US. The event is held in various locations throughout North America and is positioned to become one of the marquee events for Hospital Accreditation. The DNV GL Healthcare Symposium is designed to be a learning and networking experience. Our 2016 event will - based on participants' suggestions - feature even more peer presentations from hospitals around the country. You'll hear first hand how they address compliance, accreditation, quality and patient safety. Most importantly, you'll have plenty of time to ask questions and even follow up during social hours.
